lines: I am the saru bugyo, come from the Far East to celebrate Heavensturn with the people of Eorzea. Without the aid of one who is as skilled as shehe is generous, however, I fear the festivities shall fall flat this year...
With your generous help, our mochi has made it into the hands of the masses, and softened the people's hearts towards the mischievous monkeys.

And as our custom has been so well received, we have decided to continue making and distributing rice cakes for the duration of the festival. We would be most appreciative should you choose to aid us again!
